items.content_html: My inaugural project in React and Tailwind CSS, creating a lightweight version of YouTube. Dive into the world of dynamic UIs, reusable components, and responsive design. Explore the joy of coding as I build a simplified YouTube experience with video playback, search functionality, and a user-friendly interface.
items.title: shyamaS7shree/Youtube-clone: My inaugural project in React and Tailwind CSS, creating a lightweight version of YouTube. Dive into the world of dynamic UIs, reusable components, and responsive design. Explore the joy of coding as I build a simplified YouTube experience with video playback, search functionality, and a user-friendly interface.
